QueryDefinition.Query: select cast(replace(p.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint) as PersonId, p.provid, p.reported_date, p.quantity_of_dose, CASE WHEN p.route = 'Oral' then 4128794 WHEN p.route = 'Intravenous' then 4112421 WHEN p.route = 'Other medication route' then 45956875 WHEN p.route = 'Other injection' then 45956875 WHEN p.route = 'Subcutaneous' then 4139962 WHEN p.route = 'Inhalation' then 45956874 WHEN p.route = 'Topical' then 4231622 WHEN p.route = 'Ophthalmic' then 4157760 WHEN p.route = 'Nasal' then 4128792 WHEN p.route = 'Rectal' then 4115462 WHEN p.route = 'Urinary tract' then 4233974 WHEN p.route = 'Vaginal' then 4136280 ELSE 0 END as route_concept_id, p.route, p.ndc from {sc}.patient_reported_meds as p JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND p.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE where ndc is not NULL order by cast(replace(p.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint)
